result.name: Midnight City Theme - Roblox
result.description: This is the fixed version of the original, now the background works. The photographer of this photo is >Marc-Olivier Jodoin<, credits to him for such a good photo. This code was created by me, do give feedback for improvements in the comments. If you want more fixed roblox styles just click BoopBop at the top, or you can click DittoDino below for some mediocre youtube progressbars.
result.notes: This is the Alt of DittoDino. Disclaimers: Tablets/iPads or phones won't work, Chrome & Opera are the only browsers that work well with the extension. Press 'Read more' for further help. Help Sections Links Below. English Help Section. Turkish Translated Help Section - Yardım bölümü Türkçe'ye çevrildi. French Translated Help Section - Section d'aide traduite en français - cliquez ici. Russian/Cyrillic Translated Help Section - Русский/кириллица переведенный раздел помощи - кликните сюда. Spanish Translated Help Section - Sección de ayuda traducida al español - haga clic aquí. The original theme was this Midnight City Vibe. It's a link. 11 August 2022 - Released. 12 August 2022 - Bugs are fixed. Looks a bit better. 15 August 2022 - Applied solely to Roblox. 3 October 2022 - Gave this whole style a major overhaul, better colours, 1 single background and putting the footer back in its place. If you got recommendations to improve the theme further, I'll be glad to add them if they are indeed better. 14 October 2022 - Attempted to add a better quality image. 25 October 2022 - Changed the header and navigation containers colours to merge better with the background as well as making the navigation container more transparent. 17 April 2023 - Revamped style with new base code. 11 August 2023 - 1st anniversary, thanks for the 157k installs. 16 August 2023 - Notifications are visible again.
